website_summaries.verdict: There's a lot to love about these shoes - like multiple light modes and USB charging. Durability, however, may be an issue for some.
pros: Easy for kids to put on by themselves, thanks to hook-and-loop closure
Several different light-up modes, and charges with USB cable
A single charge lasts for hours, and the lights can be turned off to conserve power
Options for both boys and girls
cons: Lights stopped working quickly for a few users

customer_reviews.title: Looks very cool and well made!
customer_reviews.text: These kids light up shoes are so awesome! My 3 year old is going to freak. I taped up the box and put them under the tree for Christmas but Im so impressed with how nice they are. Even though they arent name brand theyre well made. There is a little charging port and button on the tongue area of the shoe that you press to light the shoes up. There are several different flashing modes and color options or you can keep them continuously lit up or turn them off. Theyre a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size, easy to put on, lights are bright, and my daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. They're true to size and easy to put on. I assume they're comfortable or she wouldn't want to wear them as much as she does. They light up bright and she loves to walk outside at night while wearing them. I like that they're Velcro and stay on. They're made really well, I was nervous when I ordered them because they weren't very expensive and I wasn't expecting great quality, but to my surprise they're actually really great. I'd definitely buy these again and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 4-year-old son who loves light up shoes. These. are. so. cool! These come with a charging cable so the lights never go out. The charging cable is pretty exposed, it's right next to the ankle bone. my son fell into a pond feet first and these shoes were dripping wet. I didn't think that they would charge again, and they did! I was so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Hanah Jasper

customer_reviews.title: You can turn the lights off!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly suprised at the quality of the shoes when they arrived. Nice thick soles, great fit. The lights have about 8 different colors/flashes including a setting to TURN THEM OFF! My little guy loves that he can pick the setting. I'm not sure how long the battery will last if you have them on continually, but the charge lasts about 3 days for us. Comes with a charge cord - mine was a little tight to get into the shoe port, but I just wiggled a little and it went right in. We absolutely LOVE these shoes and I am planning on getting a couple of more pairs in larger sizes!!
customer_reviews.author: Greta Pollock

customer_reviews.title: They charge!
customer_reviews.text: You can charge the lights on these shoes! Also have a ton of different light modes. They’re the coolest shoes. They fit as expected and quality seems like it will last as they should. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Car

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about having to charge and where the adapter was. Turns out it wasn’t an issue. Charge them over night once a month and the lights last for awhile. Adapter placement does not seem to bother my almost 3 year old and he loves to wear these. Great for evening strolls to make his visible and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are AMAZING. I was skeptical at first but boy I was surprised! They aren’t normal light up shoes that light up when the child steps. There is a place you have to plug in the usb to charge the shoe and that’s near the tongue. (This isn’t uncomfortable for the child because of where it’s placed) There is a button connected to that that changes the color and pattern of the lights. There are many different options and they stay on until you turn them off! Very bright!
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Surprise! Comes with a charger and exposed ports
customer_reviews.text: Most kids shoes dont leave the electrical bits exposed, one romp in a puddle and they're probably toast. I like the idea of instilling some responsibility, not sure if the trade off is worh it
customer_reviews.author: kristine

customer_reviews.title: Chargeable LED  Spider man shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My little boy likes it so much. It’s a bit too bigger for him. But he can’t wait to wear it to go out. It comes with the charging cable which can make the battery life longer . And the light could change color while pressing the button . The shoes also comes with a switch on/off . It’s a big plus when u don’t want kids to wear a blinking light shoes to go school. Worth for the money value.
customer_reviews.author: Ela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes. Comes with usb to charge
customer_reviews.text: These are a huge hit with my son he loves the design and the fact they light up. I’ve never had shoes that you have to charge them at least I know the battery won’t die. Very cool shoes definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: USB rechargeable, high quality and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved them. Very bright and flashes in seperate colors. These are much better then the last two generations of light up shoes for kids. Most schools have banned them but they are great for after school and weekend sneakers. They plug in to a USB adaptor to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Rohnda

customer_reviews.title: Prefect shoe for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My kid thinks they are amazing the quality is way up there. Super happy with the purchase over going to a show store.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old LOVES them. They charge easily and he has already figured out how to change the patterns/colors on his own. As far as comfort he hasn't complained about them or anything and he loves wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: KLuv

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute- the sides/toe have silver threads that don't really translate in the pic very well- have had no issue other than they definitely run on the large side- had to reorder
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Made a little guy so happy
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves Spider-Man and light up shoes, now he has both. True to size fit, and I like the charge aspect as shoes are quite bright and may not be appropriate in all settings. Parents can turn off, but he knows how to turn them on, so if wearing to church or quiet occasion, they just don’t get charged
customer_reviews.author: stevie vangorden

customer_reviews.title: sneakers
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves these they are easy to put on and take off and they light up
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Super good quality
customer_reviews.text: Shoes super beautiful lights brilliant. I bough it for a 2 years old girl . She loved it
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Fashion Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Does charge and work great! They are true to size, and the Velcro has lasted. They are not ‘playing/running’ shoes. The charging cord has fallen down and the kids complain of having a rock in their shoe, when it’s the charging adaptor. If you just want to walk around in style though, these are the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Golf Guru

customer_reviews.title: First day and my son loves them, hope they last for a while
customer_reviews.text: I would give them 5 stars if were delivered on time, looks like I ordered them on Friday with Prime delivery that is 48 hours. Instead on having them for my kid on Sunday and making a 6 year old happy, it got delivered only on Tuesday afternoon. And delivered at the apartment complex office that of course was closed by the time I got home. So my kid was kind of frustrated because the shoes that he supposed to wear them Monday at school he got them just Wednesday afternoon. Just wondering if this is a regular thing for Amazon Prime members to get delayed delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Constantin

customer_reviews.title: The charging ports can give your kid blisters
customer_reviews.text: The charging port with the button is positioned inside the shoe. On the left feet it was cutting into the foot of my kid, and gave him a blister after a day of wearing it in the school (the right foot was fine, because wires were a bit longer on it). I had to cut off the charging ports, which kind of takes away a feature of the product. The shoes are fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Alexey Chekulaev

customer_reviews.title: Impressive and Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grandson. He loved them. My daughter was impressed as I with the many different lights and the charger. Wow! The only thing I woukd improve upon is where the port is placed on the shoe. You have to adjust how the tongue is placed so it will not irritate the top of child's feet. But...a lil breaking in and you are set to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter's Rising 12

customer_reviews.title: Fits as Expected Only 1 Issue
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great for the price. They fit my son as expected and he just loves wearing them and choosing what color he wants the shoes to light up as. Comes with a charging cable to charge both shoes at once and they charge quickly and last a good amount of time. The only issue is that the place where the shoes charge protrude just a bit and can jab into the side of his foot if not tucked away properly.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, need to plug in to light up
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit fine and I probably missed it in the description, but if you want them to light up you have to charge them. The charger in the shoes bothers my son. We have had lots of light up shoes, but never one that needed to be plugged in. So good shoe so far, but I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon123

customer_reviews.title: Liked the style of shoe. Bad workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these shoes. There was red color fading from cloth of shoe into white sole. Left shoe did not light up at all. Right side did. Overall liked the shoe but sent back same day I received. Need to have better inspections/ quality control on product before selling.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoes to my kid. He really loves it. The shoes are very colorful and very easy to wear on his own. However, the I believe it cannot be washed it because the cables and the light bulbs would be broken. Be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Summerfish

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 11 toddler. They sent me a size 3 youth. They are sooo big. Now I need to send them back. I measured my foot against the soul of the sneaker and they could easily fit me. Please, do not order this product!
customer_reviews.author: Denise K

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 1.5 months
customer_reviews.text: The first pair we received was dirty and the lights would not work and they did not come with a usb charger. The second pair we received did work (and came with a charger to charge both shoes at once) but for only 1.5 months. They were so cool! However the return window has closed and now only 1 shoe lights up. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Good deals

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size delivered....
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great, light up as expected, colors are awesome....my only complaint is that I ordered a size 7.5 but received a size 10!!! My grandson won’t be able to wear them for quite some time & these were a part of his birthday gift! Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Loves Nana

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Twins loved them, but one pair didn’t lights up for long, had to Recharge up and twins wore them, for about about an hour, then I had to recharge. Twins love them , but wish they would flas the colors longer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camille H. Lorick

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 3 yr old grandson. They are cute and seem to b made well but they are huge. Ordered 8, his size. Maybe next year they will fit. Haven't looked in the shoe to see how to recharge them
customer_reviews.author: SO San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, uncomfortable design
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea and design, but the rechargeable part keeps popping out and it’s not comfortable for my daughter. Plus, they’re heavy and hard to run in. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Butter Rose

customer_reviews.title: Just wanted you to know
customer_reviews.text: My grandson really like this gift. I let him take them home. Because if not he would not have a gift to go home with. These shoes was suppose to be a size 9 for a 2yr they are a 28 I purchase 4 pairs of shoes one was deliver to the wrong house. The other 3 pairs are all the same size. 28 5yr size was a 11and 4yr 10 they are all a 28. I'm not going to return them because that all they was able to take home. Good thing is they like the shoe. And was happy with them on their feets.
customer_reviews.author: Angela moore

customer_reviews.title: Charge
customer_reviews.text: Where do I charge them at? A little big but that's ok. Child grows fast n grows out of everything in no time . Just don't know how to charge them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are barely 2 months old and one shoe will or charge up, will not light up. I would like a new pair,to pay $35 for shoes that only last two months is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: william lee robinson

customer_reviews.title: The button to change the lights is in an uncomfortable position.
customer_reviews.text: While the shoes seem built well and are super cool, the charging port/button for changing the lights is in a terrible position. I rubs up against my kids ankles and I ultimately had to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just over a month
customer_reviews.text: My son (age 4 1/2) loved these. He has had them a little over a month and they just broke today. Not sure how a 4 year old is able to break the metal piece. 😩 He doesn’t even use them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Clark

customer_reviews.title: Loooks Great
customer_reviews.text: Look just like picture. I love the lights on them. My son moves freely in them and they look great with his clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sandra D. Seals

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Light up!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my grandson for his birthday. They were a big hit! They slip on easily and stay put. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought these July 13th, a month and a half ago. Charged them once. The second time I tried to charge them they didn’t work. Won’t charge at all. So now we have $35 light-up shoes that don’t light up.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Drew Geaber

customer_reviews.title: Lights, smelly, heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is cute, Well made. but has plastic smell and it is heavy for my daughter’s foot. So will return. P.s. the lights are great, but you have to turn it on and off manually.
customer_reviews.author: Kseniia

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: These arrived and were really cute but one of the shoes would not light even after charging all night long. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ganoe

customer_reviews.title: Charging problems but it’s a cool shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look super cool. My son gets a lot of compliments. However, one of the shoes will not keep a charge at all.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Kids love,  but a bit more difficult to get on.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. It bit hard to get on and need to use the back strap. Overall pleased and so is 5 yr old great grandchild.
customer_reviews.author: RMXAGT

customer_reviews.title: Everyday need recharge
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to my son, He likes them, they're very shine. But I don't like them, I need recharge them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Boaz

customer_reviews.title: Neat Shoe! My kid loved it but It didn't last long at all
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea and my 7 year old boy loved it too. However it bearly lasted 3 months before the soles ripped. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves these shoes! I ordered a 12 since most of his size 11s are too small and I had a thumbs width at the toe and was able to slip 1 finger in at the heel. Don't seem to slide when he's wearing them. I can't find the usb port however or any velcro that I've seen mentioned. All in all great deal all around!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: They Don't Lite Up!
customer_reviews.text: One worked for a few minutes. The other, no lights. Total bust-and now my 4 yo is sad. Will be returning..
customer_reviews.author: Kim F.

customer_reviews.title: children will love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe for my grandson. The shoe is well made and is one of his favorite pair of shoes. He wants to wear them with everything. He has even wore them in the rain with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: s Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for any little boy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time and were exactly as shown! My nephew absolutely loved them 💙
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Parks

customer_reviews.title: There fun and look good
customer_reviews.text: I like the that you have different types of lights and that there chargable.
customer_reviews.author: Nene

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - come apart easily
customer_reviews.text: Lights up fine and looks nice. But the soles of both shoes came apart in less than 2 months. Very shoddy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peterpunn

customer_reviews.title: Nailed It!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Spider-Man pattern for my 4 year old grandson’s birthday present! A total hit! He as worn them to pre-school every day. In the evening, he JUMPS around outside, so excited about the lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Fetter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Design
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and my 3 sons think this shoe is super cool! Seems to be comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: The Onori’s

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look nice and light up. Little big yet but the baby will grow into them. Good price and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for young kids.
customer_reviews.text: First off, these are not typical light up shoes, you plug them in to charge. There is a button to control them. Second, the soles wear out quick, so once there is wear, there are holes to the light mechanism, so don't wear in water.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree H.

customer_reviews.title: The quality is perfect, am a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the shoes is just perfect, very strong,comfortable and fits perfectly...I made the right choice
customer_reviews.author: GRACE M.

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just amazing! I just opened them and tested both of the lights out and they are super bright! And work great, comes with a USB charging cable. Don’t know how long the lights will stay on but these shoes are so cool and worth it! My son is going to love them for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla F.

customer_reviews.title: Kids light-up shoes
customer_reviews.text: my grandson is in love with his new shoes great Buy
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gunderman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: This item i bought it for my Nephew and he really loves it and fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Lots of light up options
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier of a shoe but lots of light up options!
customer_reviews.author: lyndsey lee

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes work really well. Got them for my son. The batteries last a while on them. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Merisa

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson. He loved the lights & the green color. The shoes are too big but he will grow into them. A bit pricey!
customer_reviews.author: rose giffin

customer_reviews.title: They won’t charge.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great and worked out of the box but the left shoe won’t charge or light up anymore. This happened with both pair I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Dance party shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old grandson. He is thrilled with them! They can stay lighted or tuned off and be recharged!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Burton

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: The front of the shoes is wide open after three weeks. I don't think I need to say more.
customer_reviews.author: miaowen

customer_reviews.title: not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: One shoe has already stopped working after 2 months. Save your money and buy something else. The price clrwrly reflects the quality
customer_reviews.author: kayla tomaszewski

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift. The boy liked it wery much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights turned on when not supposed to
customer_reviews.text: The lights turned on on their own at times. My 7 year old decided he didn't like that and no longer wanted them.
customer_reviews.author: Tk

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved em!
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased many types and styles of light-up tennis shoes for our grandkids over the years but our youngest went bananas for this particular type because they basically stay on the entire time and are very bright. Now the others want the same ones. Maybe not Superman, but the same shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Bloom-Hernandiz

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift to a family member, he enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: cute light up shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 4 year old son who asked for light up shoes. Long story short he loves them. The only con I have is that you have to charge the shoes with a USB cord for them to actually light up.
customer_reviews.author: CARMEN SMILEY

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They’re amazing my kid loved them so much . Easy for him to charge and turn on by himself
customer_reviews.author: Victoria sapp

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the shoe where the charger is made my sons ankles bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Rcarr

customer_reviews.title: Lights only work for a few wearings
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes - Flashing lights quit working on the third time my grandson wore them. Defective....
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Stewart

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these, but: the lights never stop blinking and the sizing is way off-base. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Oma Gatos

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with charging cable.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came, but without the charging cable! Only one of the shoes has any charge and I am giving them as a gift tomorrow. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Dahlberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes.Constantly attracting attention, people ask me where I'm from (sometimes annoying, because I'm not in the mood to share the source of my great products). The lights are bright and comfortable once turned on.In my opinion, the price is too low.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Chowning

customer_reviews.title: Look to be made well
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look like they are made well just Did not expect the shoes to be orange.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sleater

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Fits 4 year old, who loves them, perfectly. Lights are bright and contrast nicely to the pink of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Family shopper

customer_reviews.title: kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is excellent quality, and the lights are very cool.My daughter absolutely loves these shoes. She says they are comfortable and the light's have several different patterns.I love that you can charge them when needed and there is control over when they can be turned on. I would recommend these shoes. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kief-Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Covered with soot inside shoes
customer_reviews.text: Opened box to shredded paper inside shoes, which would have been fine had the shoes been functional and not covered with soot inside. I don’t believe they were used, I’m more confused really, how would they have soot inside the shoe?
customer_reviews.author: KariAvi

customer_reviews.title: My kid is in love with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves them , he loves how they change from green to red , to yellow etc . He's in love with them will wear them around the house .
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: She loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It’s so bright. It fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lieu Dang

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working (lighting up) after one week of wear. Son was so upset. It was his Christmas present. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Sinilady

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run very big! They seem to be decently made and look like the image shown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Coolest!The lights are LED and bright! There are many lighting options and easy to charge. They are easy to put on and strap. My kids has no problem running or playing.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: :-( One shoe won’t charge
customer_reviews.text: They seemed super cool. However, we charged them and my son wore them once and now one shoe doesn’t charge. I’ve reached out to retailer and haven’t heard back. He’s bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Lights up on the side of the shoe and not the sole, better design. My daughters new favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: SO cute!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best light up shoes I've seen. We'll order them again in the next size up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors on the sole of the shoes and my 6 year old loves them
customer_reviews.author: TERMARA

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son is super happy with the shoes! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Macias

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes light up all different colors and do different patterns. Comes with a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Randazzo

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: The lights are cute and not too bright, and my daughter loves these shoes. These seem to be good quality and we’re happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: K. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They are great, had trouble charging them at the beginning but after the first day it was good. My daughter loves them. They light up in several colors. Totally got my money worth.
customer_reviews.author: NOELIA

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product! And the lights are Awesome!! She just love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pretty shoes for my 4 years old niece, and....She Just LOVE IT!!! Very, very Happy with my purchase!!! The quality really good!! And the lights are Awesome!!! I do really recommend this product!!! Size 9.5 for 4 years old little girl!!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, creative design and my son loved the lighting with different options.
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Jain

customer_reviews.title: See them a mile away
customer_reviews.text: But these for my two-year-old and they are very bright. They say they are good for three hours, and then you have to charge them. I loved him he is never out of my sight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: “Light Bulb!!!”
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for dance parties at camp grounds. Because they are easy to spot! Where’s my child? LIGHTTTTT BULBBBB!!!! There she is
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: No charger.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved the shoes but didn’t receive a charger. Ordered my granddaughter the same pair in pink. She got a charger, but the right shoe didn’t function properly. :(
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Grey shoes are not as advertised, received non rechargeable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Grey ones and received non rechargeable ones. There was no USB cable in the package and no connectors on either shoe to charge them. Very disappointing because my daughter loved the shoes and wanted to wear them right away.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

product_meta.title: YUNICUS Kids Light Up Shoes Led Flash Sneakers with Spider Upper USB Charge for Boys Girls Toddles
feature_bullets: 〠Breathable Material: Led light up shoes for kids are made of PVC upper,TPR outsole,mesh and non-toxic synthetic fabric.
〠Comfortable Design: Cool Spider Upper; Velcro makes it easy to adjust the tightness;Round toe bumper;Non-slip wear resistant rubber outsole.

〠Multicolored Led Light Toddler Sneakers: Red,green,blue, purple,white,yellow, sky blue; 7 kinds of static color, 9 kinds of flashing modes, change it as you like.Long press for 3 seconds to turn off the light.

〠Hidden USB Rechargeable: Convenient hidden switch button beside the charging port.You can connect a USB cable from the computer,you can also use mobile phones and other chargers, mobile power can also be used,safe and reliable.
〠Great Gift: The Flashing Shoes,perfect for lovers and kids,birthday,halloween,thanksgiving and christmas day ect.
